name: Mad Room No.3
description:
LET'S TURN THE MILK OVER.

In this game, you are a Japanese high school girl in the Judo club.

You woke up tied up and in an unrecognizable red room.

And your classmate Sasagawa talk to you...

Let's talk to the bizarre classmate boy.

This game is otome game,  inspired by Japanese hentai culture.

=== INFOMATION ===

Playtime: about 10 to 30 minutes

Endings : 4

Event CGs: 3

=== CAUTION ===

* If you play this game on browser, please use Google Chrome.

Don't use Safari.  Because it's unable to save/load.

* If you play this game with smartphone/tablet, you can enter config only from title page. 

(cannot enter config from menu during story mode.)

I'm sorry that this game is written in Japanese all.

If you play this game on browser such as Google Chrome, you can use web translation.

-> 2023/03/18 It may be unable to  use Google Translation for this game on itch.io...:(

I consider to add patch file of translation to English, Chinese etc. if needed.

-> 2023/03/19 Add English Version! 

Sorry, I found some mistake translation.  A revised version will be uploaded.

-> 2023/03/20 Update game file of English Version, and upload Chinese Version! 

Sorry if there are places where the translation is wrong.

In addition, dialogs remains in Japanese.

Guide page  of this game: https://bbboxxx.netlify.app/madroomno3

My site: https://bbboxxx.netlify.app
